library(tidyverse)

Set seed for reproducibility

```{r}
set.seed(1)
```

### Z score function

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)
```

Compute Z scores for `x_vec`

```{r}
(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)
```

Write a function to do this!

```{r}
z_score = function (x) {
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}
```

Check that this works

```{r}
z_score(x_vec)
```

Keep checking

```{r, error = T}
z_score(3)

z_score("my name is jeff")

z_score(c(T, T, F, T))

z_score(iris)
```

```{r, error = T}
z_score = function (x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument should be numbers")
  } else if (length(x) < 2) {
    stop("You need at least 2 numbers to get z scores")
  }
    
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  z
}


z_score(3)
z_score("my name is jeff")
z_score(c(T, T, F, T))
z_score(iris)
```
